definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: wailing, lamentation, mourning song;—´[[נ]] abs. Am 5:16 + 5 t.; [[וׇנֶהִָי]] Je 9:9; —wailing, at ´[[י]]'s judgement Mic 2:4 as acc. cogn.; Je 9:9 (c. [[נׇשָׂא עַל־]], + ´[[בְּכִ]], ‖[[קִינׇה]] ), v:Je 9:17 (c, id., ‖[[דִּמְעָה]]), v:Je 9:18 (´[[קוֹל נ]] ), Je 31:15 (‖[[בְּכִי]], [[תַּמְרוּרִים]]); mourning song ´[[יוֹדְעֵי נ]] Am 5:16 of professional mourners, skilled in mourning song; cf. Je 9:19, where taught (‖[[קִינׇת]]), also [[הִי]] Ez Eze 2:10 (‖[[אֵכֶל]], [[מִסְפֵּד]] q. v. (Ol Co rd. [[נתי]], cf. Berthol).
